attributes.action: leave office and stop destroying our Land and giving it to Islam and East Europeans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the English/British are sick to death of how You and your party push us English/British White a side in Favour of Muslims and other Ehtnic not so minority groups! this is our land and your taking away our childrens growth in favour of any other but English>
now stop we dont want you in power! why do you think the BNP are getting stronger? because we are sick of it now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
